response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, I understand its worth stands at $15,000. To facilitate a smooth transaction and ensure both parties benefit, I propose an offer of $14,500 for the product. This price allows us to maintain a competitive edge while ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist you further. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14500}
